name: EKParticipant
desc: A class that represents a participant in a calendar event.

items.name: enum EKParticipantRole
items.desc: The participant’s role for an event.

items.name: enum EKParticipantStatus
items.desc: The participant’s attendance status for an event.

items.name: var isCurrentUser: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether this participant represents the owner of this account.

items.name: var participantRole: EKParticipantRole
items.desc: The participant’s role in the event.

items.name: var contactPredicate: NSPredicate
items.desc: A predicate to use with the Contacts framework to retrieve the corresponding contact instance.

items.name: func abRecord(with: ABAddressBook) -> ABRecord?
items.desc: Returns the address book record that represents the participant.
